Catalog_Raisonne: Mutō, Shoki ukiyoe to kabuki (2005), no. 644
artist: Torii Kiyomasu ll; Publisher: Urokogataya Magobei
medium: Woodblock print (urushi-e), ink on paper, with hand-applied color and nikawa
portfolio: Three Notable Scenes of Segawa (Segawa sanpukutsui 瀬川三幅対)
text: This is the right sheet of a triptych that depicts the actor Segawa Kikunojō I (1693-1749) in three different roles that are not identified. The title cartouche says that this would be the left sheet, however, the characters for 'left' and 'right' were erroneously swapped on the two outside sheets.
title: Three Notable Scenes of Segawa [Kikunojō I], Left
